Review.Titre: Impossible to cancel. Be aware of it before signing.
Review.Contenu: Impossible to cancel. In my account it shows active subscription, but Cancel button is greyed out. I have screenshot to prove it and I've sent it to the support as well. I've tried to cancel them multiple times, reached to the support, though support chat shows usually available in few hours. Who is going to wait for it?! I waited on 3rd or 4th time and before cancelling they were asking ton of questions, why I decide to cancel, can they keep me and etc. When I said I just want to chargeback, support team said I was rude to them, and they won't tolerate such language. what?!!? Anyways, I am a customer of multiple month to month subscription, and everywhere it is easy to cancel, just by clicking cancel button. Anyways, I've done chargeback to cancel my subscription. Be careful subscribing to this service.

Review.Contenu: My computer runs really slow now while running vidIq;not sure why and do not know how to fix this! I have deleted several files that I don't use frequently, but no improvement.

Review.Titre: Do not give VidIQ your credit card…
Review.Contenu: Do not give VidIQ your credit card information.  They will lock you out of your account, so that you cannot cancel your trial subscription.  I have to cancel my credit card to stop VidIQ from charging it.  I knew I wanted to cancel the subscription on the the first day.  ViDIQ has it rigged and set up that you can never log in or sign in to cancel subscription.

Review.Titre: After not getting much value from the…
Review.Contenu: After not getting much value from the trial, we cancelled subscription, we thought, but apparently there are many more steps involved and they ended up charging 3 months beyond our cancellation before I saw the item pop up on a credit card statement.  My boyfriend attempted to contact them regarding the charges with no reply... $150 down the drain for something we never used.  Wish I would have read their reviews before we tried.

In pro,  you don't provide almost nothing. There should be some words of my 500 rupees which I pay you. If it has anything, that is only relevant for one month. Then why should I keep paying you. Your entire focus is on boost. Now the even boost mein be of no use as Pro was. In total it was a bad experience.

Review.Titre: I tried a 1-month free plan on this…
Review.Contenu: I tried a 1-month free plan on this website. It is horrible and I logged into the website like once and then forget about it. After a month they charged me 49USD. I immediately contacted customer support but they just kept sending me automatized messages. They said "﻿I am afraid we will not be able to issue a refund on a monthly charge that was already collected. ﻿The good news is that your account has been canceled and there will be no further charges." Yea REALLY GOOD NEWS...I contacted them by email and I will be updating this review as soon they will reply. Just avoid these scammers...I also told them that As an EU Consumer, I’m legally protected by the consumer rights act which gives a 14-day refund period on all digital products.They just kept ignoring my messages.Unbelievable.

Do not use them, I used the trial from them and the package was 50£ after that, so once the trial was complete I stopped using it only to find out I had been billed for two months and then trying to cancel the billing and get a refund was impossible, 5 different times they try and get you to stay when you cancel.I cant give 0 stars, would if I could.

Shameful. Unfortunately, I can’t leave a positive review for Trustpilot. The service itself is ok, but there are better alternatives on the market. This review is mainly focused towards customer service and billing. When I was charged $49 for a subscription I didn’t need, and hadn’t used I reached out to support. As an EU Consumer, I’m legally protected by the consumer rights act which gives a 14-day refund period on all digital products. Not only did VidIQ not honour this (which is a legal requirement for sales made within the EU) but they completely ignored the message. I will be filing a Dispute with my bank, as well as warning people of this fraudulent — Update, they have now agreed to refund the unused days (considering I only logged in once in 60-days, this is still very bad practice) and I will be pursuing this further.
Music is life 🇯🇲 you can do it 💪💪💟 you are welcome to ready champion sound

Somehow I opened two accounts with VidIQ. I cancelled one account before the trial ended but was billed for the 2nd one as I did not know it existed. They completely refused to issue a refund. Avoid at all costs.

Review.Titre: Vidiq are actually fraudsters, please beware
Review.Contenu: Please Trust pilot should look for a way to add 0 stars. Vidiq are actually thieves and this is not the end of this.  I cancelled the plan after just 3 days of using it since I discovered that Vidiq has nothing to offer, yet, I just checked my account now and could see a debit of £43.87 after I had cancelled the plan.  I'm actually on the telephone with my bank to report Vidiq and ensure my account is credited back with £43.87.  Do not use Vidiq, I repeat, stay away from the website, they don't even have anything on the website that will allow you to reach them for help.  No telephone number, no email, no support whatsoever.  Bunch of thieves, reaping where did not sow.  For this amount, Vidiq will cough it out as I m not done with Vidiq yet.  This is just the beginning.

I mean what knid of a company are they? They have no simpathy what so ever..They talk really rude and ignore your chats.. I have had a horrible experience with them. Avoid them at all costs.

This is a big scam! I saw a video on YouTube, I went to subscribe to them (they say put your credit card to get a free 30 days subscription). And now they don't let me to get into my account to disable the service!EDIT: HOW CAN YOU GO DOWN THIS LOW? THEY REPLIED THAT MY COMMENT IS NOT ACCURATE AND IT'S FAKE WITHOUT EVEN ASKING ABOUT WHAT EMAIL I SUBSCRIBED WITH? Oh my god this is actually pathetic. AGAIN I REPEAT DON'T GIVE THEM YOUR CREDIT CARD!

Review.Titre: I'm honestly not getting much out of…
Review.Contenu: I'm honestly not getting much out of it. The one feature (AI) I thought I was going to use a lot but each time I try to use it, it doesn't really tell me a whole lot more than I already knew from looking at my YT analytics. I have tried using the AI for video ideas and it kept pushing one idea to me over and over but I kept skipping it. Finally I gave in and created the video and so far it's a flop, the audience is not interested. There are some neat things with VIDIQ but I'm not totally sure this is for me for what I need it for.

Review.Titre: I don't see any tools that have a 'real…
Review.Contenu: I don't see any tools that have a 'real world' effect on helping me improve my channel.  The only thing VidIq is good for is showing me # of views.
Still more expensive comparing other and Tube buddy . Tags suggest is very few (only 3 tags) for pro. Should be at least double or Ten tags.

Review.Titre: UX in the application dashboards is not…
Review.Contenu: UX in the application dashboards is not that streamlined. I have to click around good few times before I get to the place I’m looking for. And then next day I have to wander around again a bit. It’s probably worth having a look at Hotjar heatmap to understand where your users tend to stuck.

Great app; only two issues:-1) No way to edit Growth Plan after selecting either subscribers or views, especially even after it's achieved once.2) No clear dates for future lessons given, it just says soon, at least give us something.

Review.Titre: vidIQ’s Biggest Problem: Their Own AI Tools
Review.Contenu: VidIQ is so beneficial in so many aspects. Helping creators grow their channels, understand the methods & goals of content creation, adding tags to videos, etc. However, the biggest problem with vidIQ is their AI system. Not every type of content creation genre has the same style for their titles. I create Roblox videos, not commentary videos. So, why is the AI giving me titles that commentary channels create? The titles don’t recommend Roblox content creation styled titles. This implies for their description too. I don’t use the AI thumbnails feature as I have my own thumbnail designer, but this is a huge letdown to be honest and it makes it really hard to work with the AI feature. Hope they improve it.

Review.Titre: It's okay depending on what you need
Review.Contenu: There were only a few features that were really useful. Other popular videos, keywords, and stats. The title generator and a few other things weren't so good. The title generator for instance literally would post titles from other videos that were popular. Like just straight up steal their title.

Review.Titre: I must say I do enjoy VIDIQ so far
Review.Contenu: I must say I do enjoy VIDIQ so far, but I must admit I started using with the boost package as of August 15th 2023 and today is the 1st of September 2023 and I cannot really tell the dramatic changes in my channel. So therefore I give a rate three stars. I am still in the learning process.

It's a very good tool which does help channel growth, however the advanced AI coach is paid, with the subscriptions which are SUPER expensive. I understand there needs to be a source of money, but there are a lot of tools and features which are really expensive. Also, the chrome extension makes Clipchamp (my editing software) not work at all so I have to disable it to edit videos.

I like this company, I can't think of a dislike as of now. I really like you all, however I think that the dailey ideas are out of date or just months old. dealing with events that are not evergreen, Some of them not all of them, with that being said Vidiq is constantly seeking  to make things better in assisting their customers and are doing a good job at it. I still would recommend dailey ideas as well as others services they provide.

Overall experience is good. The service they provide is very impressive. One thing they need to take care of is to make their subscription and billing policies more user friendly. I struggled a lot since their auto deduction/payment policy deduct the amount from my credit card without any prior notice even if I am no longer interested to continue the subscription plan. I need to get in touch with their customer support. Althought, they practively reply and resolve my queries. But, what if i am not interested to opt for auto pay for my next month subscriptions??There has to be some choice that needs to make available to users to opt for auto pay or not.

They need to have winning tags so that people's video can get not less than 1k views because we pay good money to use vidiQ
I like the customer service but didn’t really see a difference with my channel from using Vid IQ

Review.Titre: Boost is worth trying out, to see if it's right for you...if not, no BIG deal
Review.Contenu: I first signed up for basic & liked what I saw then tried Boost to try out more of the tools (SEO enhancement, tools to help grow channel like AI recommendations for new videos, coaching, instructional lectures, classes, etc.) Almost overwhelming amount of info...nice community of like-minded YouTubers accessible through vidIQ FB groups, etc. Not exactly cheap and it's not a total "fix-all". You'll still need to put in the HARD work to grow your channel, but try Boost and see what you think, if it's not for you...go back to what you were doing before. Good Luck w/your YT channel!
I Gave it a 4 because, they dont have 1 to 1 coaching in my country and i find it weird because most people here can speak english

Review.Contenu: I think this is the best YouTube app that helps small youtubers like me grow and I really enjoy this app the lessons and the best part is we can see our rewards and the second best part is we can set our youtube goals too and I think the app is perfect as it is but I think they should go A bit easier on us who can't afford for Al even tho. They give us Al for free but they can give just a little bit more free but this app is amazing and I love it!!>3💗

Review.Titre: I was frustrated by my expectations…
Review.Contenu: I was frustrated by my expectations that were incorrect.  After working with the ViDiQ team they helped me reset and understand which enhanced my UX significantly. I highly recommend VidiQ!!

Good, but there's a room for improvement.I really like some features of this platfrom, especially this gamification of youtube with all that goals and achievements. This really cheers you up sometimes even though it's minor. Some youtube advice is also really helpful and AI assistant is doing pretty good. It sometimes give me ideas for thumbnails.But AI ideas, although they definitely improved, aren't so great still. When the niche of my channel was a game called EU4, half of them were nonsensical.

Review.Titre: UPDATE: I was wrong. They care and addressed my concerns. ORIGINAL Title:I am pretty dissatisfied with VidIq
Review.Contenu: I needed to update my review and admit I was wrong. VidIQ folks reached out after my review and have addressed my concerns. Plus have provided some details and information that make sense. I would recommend this company. They get it.I am pretty dissatisfied with VidIq. Why? Videos I created for YT have very high SEO rating according to their app. However, their guidance was ineffective. I do not trust their guidance. Videos I do not follow their guidance do much better. I am going to stop using. The whole guidance on how to grow your channel is misleading. I strongly suspect the recommendations are paid to say so. Don't do. I will be cancelling soon. Be nice if they asked their user what they thought. They have not.

Review.Titre: If only the service cost was lower
Review.Contenu: I was hoping to use your services for the next 12 months. I think your service would be better than Tubebuddy, however, it's a price thing. I am still building my channel but with Black Friday discounts your service is just short of $500 aud compared to $300 aud for tubebuddy. Perhaps when I achieve a better income I will be able to make the changePaul (Paul Wheel Drive - Trip in a Kilt)

I know there are probably a lot of tools that I am not using, that I could be...So a tutorial on the functions for the different levels would be great. Thanks.

Review.Titre: I recently upgraded my subscription to…
Review.Contenu: I recently upgraded my subscription to the Max product in the hope of getting more coaching support to grow my channel.  But to access this feature, I had to learn a new computer system Disccord to access it and even then have not been helped.  Seems you pay more money to become part of a large community so not good value for money so back to basic plan without refund!UPDATE:  Having written this review I was contacted by VIDIQ via email who offered their apolygies for the experience I had encountered and by way of making ammends have completly reunded by cost of the Max subscription and also given me access to 3 months on the Pro account free of charge.  As a result of this offer, I can only review my inital points and change it accordingly.

Review.Titre: Customer service started with a smart…
Review.Contenu: Customer service started with a smart bot and pivoted to a real person within minutes. It was seamless, when the bit couldn’t answer my questions ViDIQ had someone who could standing by.

Review.Titre: vidIQ is crucial for YouTube keyword search
Review.Contenu: The level of transparency and the good customer support from the vidIQ staff members is extremely at its best. Cracking a deal on a good keyword is like jumping from the frying pan to the fire on behalf of someone like me who is just starting the journey on YouTube. vidIQ cracks down that code through its keyword search with the options to check for the matching terms, related keywords, questions being asked, and checking for the level of competition to get a good keyword I want to rank on YouTube. This is where vidIQ becomes the solution to solve my problem as a beginner on YouTube.
Adrian from Creator Customer Support was of great help, solving any doubts very quickly.
Was testing (learning) on my private unpublished site.VERY IMPRESSED - will be signing up my Content Site as we go live - YOUTUBE (@ghostsofthecartel)

Excellent support! They helped me decide whether to continue my channel after many video mistakes or start another one from the beginning. They gave me arguments and advice to improve my channel and strengthen the results I already have. I thank you so much for the incredible platform and your fantastic support. All the best!
Amazing CS - so quick to reply and suggest a less expensive alternative than I was enquiring about! Thanks Edward!
From here we can collect useful keywords and tags. And most significant thing is cute tittle for our videos. More over they provide daily ideas option

Best customer service online! I've contacted VidIQ's agents several times this year. They always provide fantastic and empathic customer service. It doesn't feel like the scripted and corporate customer service you encounter everywhere else. I hope your agents are compensated accordingly! Keep up the great work!
Giang was able to respond quickly with the issue I was having and walked me through the simple steps to get what I needed.  She also offered other great tips and information for me.

The respond through the messenger chat was fast.The lady who assisted me (Bridget) was friendly and knowledgeable.She even follow up with me a day later to see whether my issue was solved.Such professional and great service provided by VidIQ!Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: The fact that all of the features…
Review.Contenu: I love this service:)I use it multiple times per day!I had a lot of questions about features, and the vidIQ team helped me relentlessly to make sure my issues were addressed. They have literally been the BEST customer service I’ve ever experienced. I highly recommend vidIQ to anyone!!

Review.Titre: VIDIQ - THE Best Advice for New Youtube Channels
Review.Contenu: VIDIQ has excellent advice for a new Youtube channel.  I learn so much from their videos that help guide and not dictate.  I really enjoy the Live channel audit vlogs whether I'm a gaming channel or not the team always gives good insight for any type of channel.  I have the VIDIQ App and it has helped increase my channel's view time by presenting keywords and eye catching titles as well as giving me a new view on creating thumbnails.

This company has the best customer service out there! I received a reply email within minutes of my first inquiry. The team worked with me for hours on the issue. It was actually an issue at my end. I ended up resolving the issue a couple of days later. I was floored this morning when Tanya reached back out to me to see if I needed any further help.  These days you just don't see that anymore. I truly feel like a valued customer. You not only have an invaluable service but top-notch customer service. Thank You, Angie P.

I emailed a question about a particular service that I wondered if VidIQ offered. The representative, Roberta, emailed me right away and said that at this time it is not available. I didn’t respond back but today she emailed me to follow up which I felt was shocking and just so professional! Her outreach was what has now switched me from TubeBuddy to VidIQ! She truly cared about my concern. That’s huge !

Review.Titre: This is what customer service looks like, well done Edward!
Review.Contenu: Had a billing issue where I thought the company had made a mistake. Got assisted by Edward on the Vidiq online chat and he sorted everything out. I had been charged extra as I had upgraded my account Pro to Boost and taken advantage of a reduced price to try it. Totally forgot I had done this! Edward noticed that I still had my Pro account running and that was why I had been charged for this also. He cancelled my Pro account for me and took the charge for that account and credited it against my upgraded Boost account! He then asked if I wanted him to apply a 50% discount for the next six months, of course I said yes! A great company and a great product that has really helped me with my YouTube channel. Edward done amazing! Will be screenshotting this conversation to show folk what amazing customer service actually looks like! A credit to a great company.

Review.Titre: The Best Customer Service I've Had
Review.Contenu: I had Tanya, and she was amazing. She was incredibly kind and professional. Not only did she help me with my issue of needing to change my email address to my new, professional one, but she also made a catch that I somehow upgraded under two different platforms. I am so grateful for this catch, as I am strapped for cash, so this meant the world to me. Not only that, she remedied it with incredible kindness and so much help. I cannot thank her enough, or VidIQ, for being such an amazing platform and company.

Review.Titre: VidIQ: My YouTube Channel's Best Friend!
Review.Contenu: VidIQ has been a game-changer for my YouTube journey. It's like having a secret weapon in your pocket. The keyword research helps me find the right words to get noticed, and the SEO tips have boosted my video visibility.Keeping an eye on the competition? VidIQ has got that covered too. It's my go-to for tracking trends and staying ahead of the curve.Plus, the analytics, thumbnail customization, and social media integration make it an all-in-one package. It's the reason my channel is thriving.In short, if you're serious about YouTube success, VidIQ is a must-have. It's your partner in growth, and I can't recommend it enough! Thanks, VidIQ, for being awesome.

I recently had an experience with VidIQ that truly exemplified customer-centric service. After inadvertently forgetting to cancel my subscription post-trial period, I was billed for the next month. Despite the oversight being mine, VidIQ understood my situation and graciously issued a full refund, for which I am incredibly grateful.Their response was not only swift but also empathetic – characteristics that speak volumes about their commitment to customer satisfaction. This positive interaction has left a lasting impression and undoubtedly, when the time is right for me to invest in my channel further, VidIQ will be my go-to service.For anyone considering their services, I can wholeheartedly vouch for both the quality of their tools and the integrity of their support team.Thank you, VidIQ, for demonstrating that trust and understanding are still very much at the heart of great customer service.
